title: Bug 7477Status bar isn't protected against multiline messages
description: Bug 7477Status bar isn't protected against multiline messages select compilation error minimize/maximize perspectivepackage p1;public final class TableData {public final String name;public TableData(String name) {try {}finally {this.name = name;}}}
OB: Build 20011219 (win2000)If you select any task with a multiline message, then minimize the Javaperspective and maximize it again, then you end up with a status bar takinghalf the screen to show correctly the message.Steps: Java perspective define the following compilation unit, this will cause the Java compiler tocrash and produce a marker which messages is composed of multiple lines.
